comment: When studying corrosion, I have found from many authors (and I teacher I had) that the sign in the equation is (+) not (-) and Q equals to the cations concentration. Could you explain this for me please? Is driving me crazy not knowing which sign should I use in the equation. It depends on what?
An important distinction: isn't dG_naught the free energy at standard conditions, not at equilibrium? At equilibrium, dG must necessarily be zero.
